compatibility.notes: CC-BY-SA-4.0 allows for compatibility with permissive licenses but requires that derivative works also be licensed under CC-BY-SA-4.0. Care should be taken when combining with strong copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Must provide appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made.
Must license any derivative works under the same license (CC-BY-SA-4.0).
license.name: CC-BY-SA-4.0
obligations: Attribution must be given to the original creator.
ShareAlike condition requires derivative works to be licensed under the same terms.
Include a copy of the license with any distributed material.
